_comment: Image paths: cakes = public/cake products; cookies = public/cookies products/dummy images; brownie = public/brownie products. Listing shows product.image; detail shows slider when product.images has multiple.

products.title: Basic Vanilla
products.description: Classic vanilla sponge with fresh cream. Simple and delicious.
products.tabDescription: Basic Vanilla is made with care and quality ingredients. Our cakes and treats are baked fresh to order. The food colourings we use are food-grade and safe. Please note they may cause temporary stains on skin and surfaces; these are harmless and should come off with regular washing. These rates are for standard cakes. Prices may vary according to customization.
products.tabIngredients: Wheat flour, sugar, butter, eggs, fresh cream, vanilla. May contain traces of nuts and dairy.
products.tabNutritional: Per 100g (approx): Energy 350kcal, Fat 18g, Saturates 11g, Carbohydrate 42g, Sugars 28g, Protein 5g, Salt 0.3g.
